H0.text: who wrote song what a friend we have in jesus. Joseph Scriven

H1.text: who wrote song what a friend we have in jesus. Charles Converse

H2.text: who wrote song what a friend we have in jesus. Ira Sankey

H3.text: who wrote song what a friend we have in jesus. William Bolcom

A4.text: Joseph M. Scriven originally wrote the poem in 1855

A5.text: Charles Crozat Converse composed the tune to the hymn in 1868
